main event: A Dutch engineer observed and photographed a bright light identified as a flying saucer on September 2, 1952.
interesting points: The flying saucer affected the measuring instruments that the engineer was using., Several work associates also witnessed the object in the sky., The object was described as circular and metallic in construction., A young radio mechanic managed to photograph the object, which appeared to be hovering and moving rapidly., The bright light emitted from the object was so intense that it was painful to look at directly.
witness description: Dutch engineer and several work associates, and a young radio mechanic.
